pr_title: Spark: Add connector APIs for DELETE/UPDATE/MERGE

timeline.message: Spark: Add connector APIs for DELETE/UPDATE/MERGE

timeline.bodyText: Seems like Spark is about to freeze 3.1 from Monday so it is unfortunate we did not get this into Spark :(
timeline.author: aokolnychyi

replies.bodyText: I'll submit a PR next week anyway.
replies.author: aokolnychyi

replies.bodyText: We can get it in still. This is a small change.
replies.author: rdblue

replies.bodyText: And the freeze date under discussion was at least 1 December, so we have some time.
replies.author: rdblue

timeline.bodyText: Can we add Javadoc for all of these classes and methods? I think that would be helpful.
timeline.author: rdblue

replies.bodyText: Yeah, let me spend some time to add docs to the existing classes too. I think we are relatively confident in the implementation now.
